import workflowsExtensionsObj from './workflows_extensions.devdocs.json';

Extension point registry for workflows. Allows other plugins to extend workflows.

Contact [@elastic/workflows-eng](https://github.com/orgs/elastic/teams/workflows-eng) for questions regarding this plugin.
